test-case.name: fn-resolve-uri-1
test-case.Creator: Carmelo Montanez
test-case.description: Evaluation of "fn:resolve-uri" function with first argument (relative) set to empty sequence.

test-case.name: fn-resolve-uri-2
test-case.Creator: Carmelo Montanez
test-case.description: Evaluation of "fn:resolve-uri" function with first argument (relative) set to zero length string. Use base-uri property, which is set.

test-case.name: fn-resolve-uri-3
test-case.Creator: Carmelo Montanez
test-case.description: Evaluation of "fn:resolve-uri" function with first argument set to an invalid uri.

test-case.name: fn-resolve-uri-4
test-case.Creator: Carmelo Montanez
test-case.description: Evaluation of "fn:resolve-uri" function with second argument set to an invalid uri.

test-case.name: fn-resolve-uri-5
test-case.Creator: Carmelo Montanez
test-case.description: Evaluation of "fn:resolve-uri" function with first argument (relative) set to an absolute URI. Two argument version of the function.

test-case.name: fn-resolve-uri-6
test-case.Creator: Carmelo Montanez
test-case.description: Evaluation of "fn:resolve-uri" function with argument (relative) set to an absolute URI. Two argument version of the function.

test-case.name: fn-resolve-uri-7
test-case.Creator: Carmelo Montanez
test-case.description: Evaluation of "fn:resolve-uri" function with argument (relative) set to an absolute URI and given as argument to xs:string. Two argument version of the function.

test-case.name: fn-resolve-uri-8
test-case.Creator: Carmelo Montanez
test-case.description: Evaluation of "fn:resolve-uri" function with argument (relative) set to an absolute URI and given as argument to fn:string. Two argument version of the function.

test-case.name: fn-resolve-uri-9
test-case.Creator: Carmelo Montanez
test-case.description: Evaluation of "fn:resolve-uri" function with argument (relative) set to an absolute URI and given as argument to fn:upper-case. Two argument version of the function.

test-case.name: fn-resolve-uri-10
test-case.Creator: Carmelo Montanez
test-case.description: Evaluation of "fn:resolve-uri" function with argument (relative) set to an absolute URI and given as argument to fn:lower-case. Two argument version of the function.

test-case.name: fn-resolve-uri-11
test-case.Creator: Carmelo Montanez
test-case.description: Evaluation of "fn:resolve-uri" function with argument (relative) set to an absolute URI and given as argument to fn:substring function. Two argument version of the function.

test-case.name: fn-resolve-uri-12
test-case.Creator: Carmelo Montanez
test-case.description: Evaluation of "fn:resolve-uri" function with argument (relative) set to an absolute URI and given as argument to fn:string-join function. Two argument version of the function.

test-case.description: Evaluation of "fn:resolve-uri" function with argument (relative) set to an absolute URI and given as argument to fn:concat function. Two argument version of the function.

test-case.description: Evaluation of "fn:resolve-uri" function with argument (relative) set to an absolute URI and given as argument to fn:substring-before function. Two argument version of the function.

test-case.description: Evaluation of "fn:resolve-uri" function with argument (relative) set to an absolute URI and given as argument to fn:substring-after function. Two argument version of the function.

test-case.name: fn-resolve-uri-16
test-case.Creator: Carmelo Montanez
test-case.description: Evaluation of "fn:resolve-uri" function with argument (relative) set to an absolute URI and given as argument to fn:string function. Second argument set to zero length stringTwo argument version of the function.

test-case.name: fn-resolve-uri-17
test-case.Creator: Carmelo Montanez
test-case.description: Evaluation of "fn:resolve-uri" function with argument (relative) set to an absolute URI and given as argument to fn:upper-case function. Two argument version of the function.

test-case.description: Evaluation of "fn:resolve-uri" function with argument (relative) set to an absolute URI and given as argument to fn:lower-case function. Two argument version of the function.

test-case.description: Evaluation of "fn:resolve-uri" function with argument (relative) set to an absolute URI and given as argument to fn:string-join function. Two argument version of the function.

test-case.description: Evaluation of "fn:resolve-uri" function with argument (relative) set to an absolute URI and given as argument to fn:concat function. Two argument version of the function.

test-case.name: fn-resolve-uri-24
test-case.Creator: Michael Kay
test-case.description: Evaluation of "fn:resolve-uri" function with second argument ($base) being a relative URI. See erratum FO.E1

test-case.name: fn-resolve-uri-25
test-case.Creator: Michael Kay
test-case.description: Evaluation of "fn:resolve-uri" function with first argument ($relative) being an absolute URI and second argument ($base) being a relative URI. See erratum FO.E1

test-case.Creator: Frans Englich
test-case.name: K-ResolveURIFunc-1
test-case.description: A test whose essence is: `resolve-uri()`.

test-case.Creator: Frans Englich
test-case.name: K-ResolveURIFunc-2
test-case.description: A test whose essence is: `resolve-uri("http://www.example.com/", "relative/uri.ext", "wrong param")`.

test-case.Creator: Frans Englich
test-case.name: K-ResolveURIFunc-3
test-case.description: A test whose essence is: `resolve-uri("relative/uri.ext", "http://www.example.com/") eq xs:anyURI("http://www.example.com/relative/uri.ext")`.

test-case.Creator: Frans Englich
test-case.name: K-ResolveURIFunc-4
test-case.description: A test whose essence is: `resolve-uri("", "http://www.example.com/") eq xs:anyURI("http://www.example.com/")`.

test-case.Creator: Frans Englich
test-case.name: K-ResolveURIFunc-5
test-case.description: A test whose essence is: `empty(resolve-uri((), "http://www.example.com/"))`.

test-case.Creator: Frans Englich
test-case.name: K-ResolveURIFunc-6
test-case.description: A test whose essence is: `resolve-uri("http://www.example.com/absolute", "http://www.example.com/") eq xs:anyURI("http://www.example.com/absolute")`.
